result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Scheduling Order
Adjourned initial appearance on July 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Acknowledgment and Receipt of Defendant's Passport/Passport will be held securely in the Clerk of Courts office until further order of the Court
Right to Legal Representation in a Criminal or Criminal Traffic Case
Right to Legal Representation in a Criminal or Criminal Traffic Case

[MK] case called at 1:45pm 
Defendant Travis A. Sawyer appears via videoconferencing from the Jefferson County Jail, in custody, along with Public Defender Amber Rumpf (the PD will appears for bond-purposes only; Mr. Sawyer is not eligible for PD representation).  Public Service Special Prosecutor Melanie Flint appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charges and maximum penalties are recited.
Right to counsel is given.  Mr. Sawyer indicates that he will looking into hiring an attorney. 
The Court preserves the Defendant's constitutional and jurisdictional rights. The Court tolls Preliminary Hearing time limits.

The Court requires a $100,000 Signature Bond with conditions:
--no contact with Victim 1 or Victim 2 
--no presence at Victim 1 or Victim 2's residence(s)
--no unsupervised contact with any minor female including his own daughter
--Mr. Sawyer shall surrender his passport to the Clerk of Courts Office Office no later than end of business [4:30pm] on Wednesday July 6th 

Victim rights compliance is verified. 
recess 1:57pm. 

NEXT:Adjourned Initial Appearance (and status-of-counsel hearing) on July 22nd at 10:30am
